item.title: Game Engine Architecture
item.description: Based on : Game Engine Architecture by Jason Gregory All the technology that goes in making a AAA game!!!! Foundations Introduction Industry overview Structure of a Typical Game Team Engineers Artists Game Designers Producers Other Staff Publishers and Studios What is a Game?? Video Games as Soft Real-Time Simulations What is a Game Engine?? Engine Differences across Genres First-Person Shooter(Quake, Unreal Tournament, Half Life) Platformers and Other Third-Person Games(Gears of War, Dead Space, Red Dead Redemption, Uncharted) Fighting Games(Soul Calliber, Tekken, Fight Night) Racing Games(NFS, Gran Turismo, Mario kart) Real Time Strategy(Warcraft, Starcraft, Command and Conquer, Age of Empires) Massively Multiplayer Online Games(World of Warcraft, Destiny) Player Authored Content(Mods)(Minecraft) Other Games(sports, RPG, puzzle games, social sims, text based!
